pr_title: Add config option to make currency symbol as a suffix

timeline.message: Add config option to make currency symbol as a suffix

timeline.bodyText: This feels messy. I'm trying to think about the right way to get out of this (configuration depending on configuration, liable to break when the one is changed) without torching existing configurations.
timeline.author: Ichbinjoe

replies.bodyText: What are you talking about? This would not break, it's just the ternary operator which is a standard part of java, nothing IMO needs changing here as it works just fine.
replies.author: JRoy

replies.bodyText: If you're talking about decimal parsing, that was already part of the code before this and is out of the scope of this PR
replies.author: JRoy

replies.bodyText:
I'll agree with Joe in that this could at least be split into several lines for readability. Right now you have what is effectively a nested conditional, with the ternary statement inside of an if statement. A little here can go a long way.
As for the configuration dependencies, I don't know how much can be done about it currently. I already approved this PR under the assumption that what you've done is about as good as it will get with how Essentials is currently designed.
replies.author: pop4959
Ichbinjoe
